verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees<WH4609> of David.<WH1732> If<WH3884> it had not been<WH1961> the LORD<WH3068> who was on our side, now<WH4994> may Israel<WH3478> say;<WH559>
If<WH3884> it had not been<WH1961> the LORD<WH3068> who was on our side, when men<WH120> rose<WH6965> up against<WH5921> us:
Then<WH233> they had swallowed<WH1104> us up quick,<WH2416> when their wrath<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against us:
Then<WH233> the waters<WH4325> had overwhelmed<WH7857> us, the stream<WH5158> had gone<WH5674> over<WH5674> our soul:<WH5315>
Then<WH233> the proud<WH2121> waters<WH4325> had gone<WH5674> over<WH5674> our soul.<WH5315>
Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD,<WH3068> who has not given<WH5414> us as a prey<WH2964> to their teeth.<WH8127>
Our soul<WH5315> is escaped<WH4422> as a bird<WH6833> out of the snare<WH6341> of the fowlers:<WH3369> the snare<WH6341> is broken,<WH7665> and we are escaped.<WH4422>
Our help<WH5828> is in the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> who made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth.<WH776>
